analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x6fb6819ff5ad4bf15eba82dd05a5f4edefe3a41b.sol:
	Contract LimeX has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x6fb6819ff5ad4bf15eba82dd05a5f4edefe3a41b.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x6fb6819ff5ad4bf15eba82dd05a5f4edefe3a41b.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
